item.description: A tool for comparing different super funds or contribution amounts.

item.title: How Consumers Budget
item.description: Expanding our understanding of budgeting beliefs and behaviours.

item.title: Tax Time 2019
item.description: Encouraging customers to reduce their high-interest debts at tax time.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! This is a personal website I created to share a bit about myself and my work. I currently work as a Senior Behavioural Scientist at ANZ (previously CommBank), where my aim is to take an evidence-based approach to improving the financial outcomes of our customers. I also recently completed my PhD in Psychology at UNSW Sydney, with my research centred around how uncertainty influences the way we make saving decisions.

item.title: CV
item.description: Click here for a PDF copy of my most recently updated resume. Last updated: Mar 2023 Experience Senior Behavioural Scientist, ANZ Feb 2023 - Present Behavioural Scientist, Commonwealth Bank of Australia Nov 2018 - Feb 2023 Worked on a combination of applied and research projects aiming to use behavioural science to improve the financial wellbeing of customers and communities. Examples of previous work: Leading a program of work aimed at leveraging behavioural science insights to improve the bankâ€™s approach to scams and fraud.
